ygData.subject: Re: Honeycombs - correction
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s a correction to my earlier post about nerfing the quest for the glowing stein - after the next patch, the glowing stein will be known as the Stein of
ygData.messageBody:
Here's a correction to my earlier post about nerfing the quest for the
glowing stein - after the next patch, the glowing stein will be known as the
Stein of Moggok, and will be a 7 dmg 43 delay 1h blunt weapon that has to be
equipped in your primary melee slot. It's supposed to have the same bonouses
and is NOT supposed to be a NO DROP item. My info was obtained from a
reliable website. Here's one quote that was posted there:

<begin quote>

As of Monday's patch on the Test Server, the Glowing Stein is no more. If
you possessed it, it is now a Stein of Moggok. It is now a 7/43 1 handed
blunt weapon, and can only be carried in the primary melee slot (right
hand). If you already had it in the secondary melee slot (left hand), then
it will stay there until you remove it. Other than that, it is the same.
MAGIC ITEM, and LORE ITEM and is NOT no drop. However, the quest difficulty
is being increased once the new item is implemented. This has been verified
by GM's.

Remember last time this happened? A lot of items ended up being found only
on the Plane of Fear. It seems Verant has a bad habit of understating
things.

</end quote>
